page.title: 07The Local Dialect
page.content: In mar street me an me mate Gaz ave funt a wey of break dancin that owe uthers anna gorra clue ar do.Wave thowt abart dooin summat fer a long tarm nar. Owe uthers arr prancin abart at cowner o street evry neet.Me an Gaz didna fancy messin rind pleeyin with rest on em,way wos owt to bey fost rate. Anywey way went rind an give em the works.Gaz wos spinnin rind on is yed an back-flippin over mey.Jus wen way thowt theed ad enuf Beany cums rind cowner.Aid dun it owe ad Beany ays braggin abart owe is tricks.Gaz toad im weir gerroff but ay didna,Beany rekind e cud do owt.Anywey fost backflip ay slipped an fell on Bosted Brendas foot an owe ell was let go,shay didna afe wollop im.Me and Gaz cuddna stop laffin weve kept owt o Beanys wey since thoo. Lee Murfin.Gary Latham.
